LanguageData.MessageRaidersDetectedEarlyAssault: {0} a {1}-ből észrevettek titeket és előbb kezdik meg a rohamot.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersKidnapping: {0} a {1}-ből úgy döntöttek, hogy elrabolják akit tudnak és távoznak.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersStealing: {0} from {1} have decided to steal what they can and leave.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersGivenUpLeaving: {0} from {1} have given up and are leaving.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersSatisfiedLeaving: {0} a {1}-ből elégedettek a rombolással, amit tettek és távoznak.
LanguageData.MessageVisitorsTakingWounded: {0} from {1} are taking a wounded guest.
LanguageData.MessageVisitorsTrappedLeaving: {0} from {1} have been trapped and are digging out to escape.
LanguageData.MessageWornApparelDeterioratedAway: {0} worn by {1} deteriorated away to nothing.
LanguageData.MessageNeedBeaconToTradeWithShip: You need an orbital trade beacon to trade with a ship.\n\nThe beacon needs to be powered.
LanguageData.MessageOutOfNearbyShellsFor: {0} found no nearby unreserved shells for {1}.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalsGoPsychoHunted: Warning: {0}s will often attack when harmed.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalManhuntsOnTameFailed: Warning: {0}s may attack upon a failed taming attempt ({1} chance).
LanguageData.MessageTameAndNameSuccess: {0} successfully tamed {1} ({2} chance) and named HIM {3}.
LanguageData.MessageColonyCannotAfford: A kolónia nem engedheti meg magának ezt a vásárlást.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHarvestableWood: Eléggé kifejlett és fát adó fákat kell kijelölni.
LanguageData.MessageAlreadyInStorage: This is already in storage and will be moved to high-priority storage as necessary.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateStrippable: Must designate corpse or downed character with strippable apparel.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateSlaughterable: Must designate tame animal that belongs to the colony.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateOpenable: Must designate full graves or containers.
LanguageData.MessageNoAnimalBeds: There are no animal beds available.
LanguageData.MessageTooLowMedCare: Operation requires {0} or better, but {1}'s current medical care mode is "{2}".
LanguageData.MessageInvoluntarySleep: {0} has collapsed due to extreme exhaustion.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureCatastroph: {0} has failed catastrophically while operating on {1}.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureMinor: {0} has failed in a minor way while operating on {1}.
LanguageData.MessagePawnExitMapRelationsGain: Because {0} exited the map healthy, relations with {1} have improved by {2}.
LanguageData.MessageMiscarriedPoorHealth: {0} has miscarried due to poor health.
LanguageData.MessageNoHandlerSkilledEnough: No handler can tame {0} (requires level {1} in {2}, best handler {3} has {4}).
LanguageData.MessageHiveReproduced: A bug hive has reproduced itself.
LanguageData.MessageTraderCaravanLeaving: The trade caravan from {0} is leaving.
LanguageData.MessageSocialFight: {0} started a social fight with {1}. Reason: {2}.
LanguageData.MessageNewMarriageCeremony: Colonists are gathering to celebrate {0} and {1}’s marriage.
LanguageData.MessageMarriageCeremonyStarts: {0} and {1} are beginning their marriage ceremony!
LanguageData.MessageMarriageCeremonyCalledOff: The marriage ceremony for {0} and {1} has been called off.
LanguageData.MessageNewlyMarried: {0} and {1} have married. Colonists are now celebrating the occasion.
LanguageData.MessageMarriageCeremonyAfterPartyFinishe: The marriage ceremony for {0} and {1} has finished.
LanguageData.MessageNewBondRelationNewName: {0} and {1} have formed a bond. {0} has named HIM {2}.
LanguageData.MessageBondedAnimalMentalBreak: {0} has a mental break because of {1}'s death.

LanguageData.MessageBondedAnimalsMentalBreak: {0} animals have a mental break because of {1}'s death.
